io.appium.java_client.events.api.general

Interface AlertEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Listener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultListener

    public interface AlertEventListener
extends Listener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterAlertAccept(WebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert)
      This action will be performed each time after Alert.accept()
      void afterAlertDismiss(WebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert)
      This action will be performed each time before Alert.dismiss()
      void afterAlertSendKeys(WebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert, String keys)
      This action will be performed each time after Alert.sendKeys(String)
      void afterAuthentication(WebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert, org.openqa.selenium.security.Credentials credentials)
      This action will be performed each time after Alert.setCredentials(Credentials) and Alert.authenticateUsing(Credentials)
      void beforeAlertAccept(WebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert)
      This action will be performed each time before Alert.accept()
      void beforeAlertDismiss(WebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert)
      This action will be performed each time after Alert.dismiss()
      void beforeAlertSendKeys(WebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert, String keys)
      This action will be performed each time before Alert.sendKeys(String)
      void beforeAuthentication(WebDriver driver, org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert, org.openqa.selenium.security.Credentials credentials)
      This action will be performed each time before Alert.setCredentials(Credentials) and Alert.authenticateUsing(Credentials)

    • Method Detail

      • beforeAlertAccept

        void beforeAlertAccept(WebDriver driver,
                     org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert)
        This action will be performed each time before Alert.accept()
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        alert - Alert which is being accepted

      • afterAlertAccept

        void afterAlertAccept(WebDriver driver,
                    org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert)
        This action will be performed each time after Alert.accept()
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        alert - Alert which has been accepted

      • afterAlertDismiss

        void afterAlertDismiss(WebDriver driver,
                     org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert)
        This action will be performed each time before Alert.dismiss()
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        alert - Alert which which is being dismissed

        alert - Alert which has been dismissed

      • beforeAlertSendKeys

        void beforeAlertSendKeys(WebDriver driver,
                       org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert,
                       String keys)
        This action will be performed each time before Alert.sendKeys(String)
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        alert - Alert which is receiving keys
        keys - Keys which are being sent

      • afterAlertSendKeys

        void afterAlertSendKeys(WebDriver driver,
                      org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert,
                      String keys)
        This action will be performed each time after Alert.sendKeys(String)
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        alert - Alert which has received keys
        keys - Keys which have been sent

      • beforeAuthentication

        void beforeAuthentication(WebDriver driver,
                        org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert,
                        org.openqa.selenium.security.Credentials credentials)
        This action will be performed each time before Alert.setCredentials(Credentials) and Alert.authenticateUsing(Credentials)
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        alert - Alert which is receiving user credentials
        credentials - which are being sent

      • afterAuthentication

        void afterAuthentication(WebDriver driver,
                       org.openqa.selenium.Alert alert,
                       org.openqa.selenium.security.Credentials credentials)
        This action will be performed each time after Alert.setCredentials(Credentials) and Alert.authenticateUsing(Credentials)
        Parameters:
        driver - WebDriver
        alert - Alert which has received user credentials
        credentials - which have been sent
